'''Radiant Spincrystal 32''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Flows of Jade-Like Water]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on top of a box at the ground level of [[Wangshu Inn]].
